column4: good afternoon from mexico friends excuse me i have a serious problem at my office with the ubuntu 5.04 it is a server it doesnt recognized my  network interfaces when i restarted it couse the light turned off
i restarted the server and it didnt recognicez the net interfaces
are you installing it or have you been using it for quite some time?
i have a lot of time using it
did it happen when you upgraded your kernal?
it happened when the server restarted i was doing there nothing
i didnt updated the kernel and it was working good
why did it restart in the first place?
it restarted couse the light turned off for a lot of time
maybe your lan card is dead? tried replacing it? does your server recognize eth0?
i tryied it too with other one and its the same it detects in lspci but i can configure it with ifconfig
i said that i tryied replacing the card with oder one but it is the same it detects the new card in lspci but not in ifconfig an i try manually with ifconfig and that it says device not found
you've got soething groovy going on there. :D. any error messages?
no error message only not found
